snippet: A court in Belgium ruled on Tuesday that the former wife and accomplice of the convicted child killer Marc Dutroux could be released from prison and sent to a convent.
lead_paragraph: A court in Belgium ruled on Tuesday that the former wife and accomplice of the convicted child killer Marc Dutroux could be released from prison and sent to a convent.

headline.main: Accomplice in Belgian Child Killings Paroled to Convent
headline.print_headline: Accomplice in Belgian Child Killings Paroled to Convent
